comment: I took her for Art Education and I loved her. She is an easy grader and took late work as well. The projects were easy too. She has good guest speakers and her activities are fun. I feel like I learned a lot. I am taking her again next semester and I am looking forward to it.

Posting this since she doesn't have many reviews yet. Professor Lim is very kind and I'm enjoying her class! We have 15 modules with three tests, and have to respond to 5 discussion posts for classwork credit. We have one final paper for a museum visit. She gives great feedback and lots of good information for our tests. Would take again!

She is really nice and she has an accent. She lectures all class, but her lectures are really boring.. Tests are online and there's lots of reading material but they're not hard. Good class for makeup work in other classes. She grades really easy and wants you to do good. Not an interesting class unless you truly like art history, but an easy A.

i loved this course! all her class is lecture-based but she shows a lot of fun videos to keep you engaged and understand the course material better. very few writing assignments that are very short & easy & relatively few quizzes/tests that are online without lockdown. attendance is a grade but all lectures are on D2L. she is so so sweet, take her!
Easy class. Few grades, but test and quizzes are online and quizzes have many attempts. Class was boring but art is not my thing. Attendance is graded. Easy A if you stay on top of it.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Graded by few things
